channel.title: Jad crashing?
channel.description: Whenever i attack the jad on my server, my client freezes and i get this error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1597) at client.method146(client.java:12167) at client.method102(client.java:7945) at client.method9(client.java:8831) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4642) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] How can i prevent this?

item.title: Jad crashing?
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

Whenever i attack the jad on my server, my client freezes and i get this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1597) at client.method146(client.java:12167) at client.method102(client.java:7945) at client.method9(client.java:8831) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4642) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) How can i prevent this?

Read full topic
